entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
